message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to pay up to $9500 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $10200 for the product. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $10200, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm close to my minimum price, and I'd rather not sell to you at a loss.
